item.title: TITANIC SURVIVAL PREDICTION USING MACHINE LEARNING
item.description:
Data Source: https://www.kaggle.com/c/titanic

In this project, we will build, train and test a machine learning model to predict titanic survivors based on their features such as age, number of siblings, and ticket class. We will explore two machine learning algorithms, namely: (1) logistic regression classifier model and; (2) Naive Bayes classifier model.

LEARNING OBJECTIVES

  1. Perform data cleaning, feature engineering and visualization
  2. Build, train and test a logistic regression classifier model in Sklearn
  3. Understand the theory and intuition behind logistic regression classifier models

Project Structure:

This project is divided into different tasks:

item.title: PART 4 MASTERING DATA ANALYSIS WITH PANDAS
item.description:
In this structured series of hands-on projects, we will master the fundamentals of data analysis and manipulation with Pandas and Python. Pandas is a super powerful, fast, flexible and easy to use open-source data analysis and manipulation tool. This project is the fourth of a series of multiple projects (learning path) that is designed for anyone who wants to master data analysis with pandas.

Learning Objectives

  1. Mastering date and time operations in Pandas
  2. Define and manipulate Pandas DataFrames
  3. Master data analysis, Group by, and multi-indexing in Pandas and Python

Project Structure:

This project is divided into different tasks:

item.title: PART 5 MASTERING DATA ANALYSIS WITH PANDAS
item.description:
In this structured series of hands-on projects, we will master the fundamentals of data analysis and manipulation with Pandas and Python. Pandas is a super powerful, fast, flexible and easy to use open-source data analysis and manipulation tool. This project is the fifth of a series of multiple projects (learning path) that is designed for anyone who wants to master data analysis with pandas.

Learning Objectives

  1. Define and manipulate Pandas DataFrames and text data
  2. Perform text data cleaning by removing stopwords and punctuations
  3. Visualize Pandas DataFrames such as Count plot, Histograms, and Word Cloud

Project Structure:

This project is divided into different tasks:

item.title: PART 2 MASTERING DATA ANALYSIS WITH PANDAS

In this structured series of hands-on projects, we will master the fundamentals of data analysis and manipulation with Pandas and Python. Pandas is a super powerful, fast, flexible and easy to use open-source data analysis and manipulation tool. This project is the second of a series of multiple projects (learning path) that is designed for anyone who wants to master data analysis with pandas.

Learning Objectives

  1. Perform Label-based and Integer-based DataFrame indexing
  2. Define and manipulate multi-dimensional Pandas DataFrames
  3. Master data analysis and manipulation in Pandas and Python

Project Structure:

In this structured series of hands-on projects, we will master the fundamentals of data analysis and manipulation with Pandas and Python. Pandas is a super powerful, fast, flexible and easy to use open-source data analysis and manipulation tool. This project is the third of a series of multiple projects (learning path) that is designed for anyone who wants to master data analysis with pandas.

In this structured series of projects, we will master the fundamentals of data analysis and manipulation with Pandas and Python. Pandas is a super powerful, fast, flexible and easy to use open-source data analysis and manipulation tool. This project is the first of a series of multiple projects (learning path) that is designed for anyone who wants to master data analysis with pandas.

Learning Objectives
